bcbioSingleCell 0.1.18
  • Reference

General Arguments

Source: R/general.R
general.Rd

General Arguments

Arguments

aspectRatio

scalar integer. Aspect ratio.
color

ggproto/ScaleDiscrete or NULL. Desired ggplot2 color scale. Must supply discrete values. When set to NULL, the default ggplot2 color palette will be used. If manual color definitions are desired, we recommend using ggplot2::scale_color_manual(). To set the discrete color palette globally, use options(bcbio.discrete.color = scale_color_viridis_d()).
fill

ggproto/ScaleDiscrete or NULL. Desired ggplot2 fill scale. Must supply discrete values. When set to NULL, the default ggplot2 color palette will be used. If manual color definitions are desired, we recommend using ggplot2::scale_fill_manual(). To set the discrete fill palette globally, use options(bcbio.discrete.fill = scale_fill_viridis_d()).
gene2symbol

data.frame. Gene-to-symbol mappings. Columns must contain geneID and geneName.
dark

boolean. Plot against a dark background using basejump::theme_midnight().
dir

string. Output directory path.
expression

string. Calculation to apply. Uses match.arg() and defaults to the first argument in the character vector.
gene2symbol

boolean. Automatically interconvert gene identifiers and gene names in plots. Useful for marker plots.
genes

character. Gene identifiers. Must match the rownames of the object.
geom

string. Plot type. Uses match.arg() and defaults to the first argument in the character vector.
grid

boolean. Show major grid lines but hide axis lines.
headerLevel

scalar integer (1-7). R Markdown header level.
interestingGroups

character or NULL. Character vector of interesting groups. Must be formatted in camel case and intersect with sampleData() colnames.
label

boolean. Overlay a cluster identitiy label on the plot.
labelSize

scalar integer. Size of the text label.
legend

boolean. Include plot legend.
min

scalar numeric. Recommended minimum value cutoff.
max

scalar numeric. Recommended maximum value cutoff.
object

Object.
prefilter

boolean. Apply prefiltering to remove zero count genes.
pipeline

string. Pipeline used to generate the samples.
pointAlpha

scalar numeric (0-1). Alpha transparency level. Useful when there many cells in the dataset, and some cells can be masked.
pointsAsNumbers

boolean. Plot the points as numbers (TRUE) or dots (FALSE).
pointSize

scalar numeric. Cell point size.
reduction

string. Dimensional reduction method to apply. Defaults to t-SNE ("TSNE") but UMAP is also supported ("UMAP").
return

string. Return type. Uses base::match.arg() internally and defaults to the first argument in the character vector.
title

string or NULL. Plot title.
trans

string. Name of the axis scale transformation to apply. See help("scale_x_continuous", "ggplot2") for more information.
trendline

boolean. Include trendline on plot.
value

Object to assign.
x

Primary object.
y

Secondary object.
zinbwave

boolean. Run zinbwave::zinbwave() to automatically apply a ZINB regression model to calculate normalizedValues and weights matrices to by used for differential expression with DESeq2 or edgeR. Note that this calculation should only be performed on filtered data. For large datasets this can take a long time and use a lot of memory, so this calculation is disabled by default.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

No value.

Contents
